meanings.definition: A structure consisting of two layers.
meanings.sent1: The bilayer of the cake made it extra delicious.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich had a bilayer of cheese in the middle.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally created a bilayer of socks in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The bilayer of clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful bilayer of colors on the canvas.

meanings.sent1: The bilayer of paint on the wall was starting to peel.
meanings.sent2: The cell membrane is composed of a bilayer of phospholipid molecules.
meanings.sent3: I found a bilayer of gum stuck under the desk.
meanings.sent4: The bilayer of ice on the pond was thin and fragile.
meanings.sent5: The bilayer of perfume scents filled the room with a sweet aroma.
